Title: Perfect by many means.
Reveiw: Its design is fantastic, looks are amazing, features are impressive, refinement is excellent, NVH levels are superb, ride quality is ultimate and can be easily compared to my Innova Crysta. The diesel manual mileage is excellent, seat comfort is superb. Back seat of this vehicle occupies 3 people comfortably. The boot space has enough for luggage of five people for a short trip. I can assure you that, this vehicle has one of the best ride quality which can be easily comparable to my Innova Crysta in terms of ride quality. Seltos is a breeze to drive. I drove the petrol GT line also for short distances, and it is also a great variant to own. You can go for either variant as per your needs and choice. Both variants are great. Diesel is giving me 17kmpl overall at present for 60% highway and 40% city drive with AC 100% on. I hope, the mileage will definitely increase after the second service(oil change) to 19kmpl overall. It is also embedded with a smart air purifier with perfume diffuser which is added as an advantage. AC is powerful and works fantastic. In my opinion, there is no competitor for Seltos, when it comes to the overall package. Highly recommended.

Title: Good but doesn't deserve 5 stars
Reveiw: Seltos, in the price, is a very good car someone can get. Everything in it is pretty good but being a new company, the after-sales service that you'll get may leave you unsatisfied. Also, suspension in it is a bit on the harder side, it pumps back the vehicle and this is the only reason I've given it 4 stars because when we buy a car, with power, looks and features we tend to find comfort, which is a major reason of selecting a particular car. Yet the tyres used are too slim in such a heavy vehicle and after paying a huge amount of money. This doesn't give the feel of drive which you can get in some other vehicles in the same price range. So I'd say you can check other vehicles too if you're looking for a MUV at this range. Prolly Hector will be the best with head on head with Creta.

Title: Best Compact SUV

Title: Enter the World of Seltos
Reveiw: The front end of the Seltos is particularly impressive. The huge Tiger Nose grille is Kia's design trademark, has a knurled aluminium finish, with a contrasting black plastic grille. Pair this with large sweeping headlights and turn indicators, along with vertically placed fog lamps, and the Seltos cuts a fine figure, with imposing road presence.

Title: Excellent Car
Reveiw: The interior is excellent with cam, seating, and advanced technology. The Kia Seltos also comes with ventilated seats, 2-step reclining rear seats, electric sunroof, push-button start, electrically adjustable driver's seat, auto climate control, keyless entry, and a 360-degree camera. The safety tech adds six airbags, ABS with EBD, front and rear parking sensors, ESP, hill hold control and blind view monitor. The car uses advanced high strength steel in its construction for improved safety.

Title: Best in class SUV . Worth buying Kia Seltos.
Reveiw: I tried to ignore writing a review of the car. But the quality, performance and overall comfort of the car forced me to do so. I am here writing about Kia Seltos. Using this car for a bit now with decent 10000km on record. The car will not at all disappoint you in terms of pickup and driving comfort. The seats hold you so well and on top of it the response that you get from the steering. Really impressed. I have also driven another SUV's like Creta, Nissan kicks Mahindra XUV. But Kia has really made its presence and you will feel that in every term of the car. Drove the car on hilly terrain and the motor inside it gives you that punch even if driving on a steep upward hill. No power lag nothing. It's worth buying no second thoughts to look around. Best in class.

Reveiw: A very comfortable and smooth vehicle. The gear-box is very smooth.

Title: Great car with good fit and finish
Reveiw: The Kia Seltos is good in every possible way, but there is a huge downside to the Seltos in case of pricing, where the vehicle is manufactured in Andhrapradesh the prices must be a bit low as all the other rival are priced very less in spite of manufacturing out of India. There is one thing Kia should implement which is it should provide the essential features like 360 camera,6 airbags even in the HT line as these are essential.

Title: SELTOS - THE DEVIL BY KIA
Reveiw: Kia entered the Indian market with the SELTOS the one which shook the Hyundai CRETA and takes the first position in the compact SUV segment. It is offered with a 10.25-inch touchscreen display, KIA's UVO connects, air purifier, sunroof, and HUD(Heads Up Display). The car has three engine options all of them available either in manual or automatic transmissions. The car is BS6 compliant and Kia has nailed it with the design and features. Being a new company it cannot provide after-sales service like Hyundai. The carmaker is doing great and will do much better in the future.

Title: Amazing looks.
Reveiw: Amazing car with ultimate colors.

Title: Beat of 2019.
Reveiw: Best of 2019 just because it has extra features and good looking interior and exterior design.

Title: Great car.
Reveiw: Best in class, good infotainment system, smooth driving and feels like a premium one. For only who can afford it.

Title: The affordable beast.
Reveiw: The affordable SUV car is so comfortable and it has many functions. It has a sunroof as well. Also available at the cheapest rate as compared to the Venue.

Title: Best in the market.
Reveiw: I love the interior of this car This is perfect for the family and It is an affordable good looking car. The front-facing is superb.

Title: Truth of KIA SELTOS
Reveiw: It's a nice car and really worth the price. It looks fantastic when it runs like a cheetah on the road. Talking about the safety of the car, absolutely safe car. Power and horsepower are really very powerful. Boot space is also very huge. Radio screen of 8 inches looks perfect and the speakers of BOSE give a clear voice and it has mood light also which turns the colours according to the song.

Title: Nice car for family
Reveiw: The car gets at the top speed in no time, it is a great car to get the money worth. The Seltos is amazingly featured as well.

Title: Best car award
Reveiw: This car is very excellent in this price range because in this car there are more additional features.

Title: Value for money
Reveiw: Good experience while seating on driver seat. It is like, this is the car I was waiting for. It has a 4-star quality, being a middle-class 1 star less for price.

Title: Good looking XUV car.
Reveiw: Very Nice car and feels like luxurious looking XUV. Very comfortable and amazing features.

Title: TE REAL LOVE.
Reveiw: SELTOS HAS GIVEN A BIG COMPETITION TO HYUNDAI CRETA IN THIS SEGMENT. THE KIA IS ABSOLUTELY THE KING.

Title: The best one.
Reveiw: Such an Impeccable Machine with flawless drive, Indomitable power, eye-catching design, and Hushed Engine. Its a feeling of some luxury segment at very competitive pricing. Moreover Interior is just mind-blowing with such soothing acoustic sound. Pocket-friendly for all mileage concern buyers as it easily churns 18 km-22 km per liter depending on city and highway drive. Nevertheless kudos to Kia for launching such a true car in India.

Title: Great car launched by the company.
Reveiw: Wonderfull look this car has, interiors are mind-blowing. This car is fully loaded with multiple features.

Title: Makes it perfect.
Reveiw: I had fun while test driving the demon. A good one with awesome driving excellence. Great build quality and control.

Title: Very nice car.
Reveiw: This car is a very silent and very nice car. It has many new, useful features. Quite spacious as well.

Title: Best Compact SUV in India.
Reveiw: A car that is built to conquer the mid-size SUV segment. With all the bells and whistles coming in terms of features and power(1.4 turbo petrol) combined with the variety to choose from, be it types of transmission options and varients and also color options, made to be unique for almost every masterpiece made making it an extreme value for money proposition. Worth every penny.

Title: The best car ever.
Reveiw: The Kia Seltos has a very different design, and very much comfortable.

Title: Amazing car.
Reveiw: Great performance with dashing looks.

Title: Not up to the mark.
Reveiw: The car looks like SUV but not the real SUV. The petrol engine never makes any noise but here I can see unexpected things. IVT is lazy. Manual petrol and 1.4 is good. Diesel major looks difference from petrol even the grill and the bumper not matching with. Petrol 1.4 and diesel have all the disc brake, not the other petrol. Bose speaker is only available on the top variant. Not an offroader. BS6 fuel not available all the places few cars indicate engine issues already in diesel variant.

Title: Mind-blowing car.
Reveiw: Very excellent car, the look of the car is impressive and the ride and handling quality is awesome. The interior of the car is so classy, every look of car is so commendable. The color combinations of the car are too good. The alloy of car is mind-blowing and boot space is very much spacious.

Title: Amazing car.
Reveiw: Very good car with a fantastic front look and have a great boot space. Have sufficient leg space at the back.

Title: A new age SUV.
Reveiw: Fully feature-loaded SUV. Kia has done excellent work for Indian customers. 5-star for its look, features, and performance.

Title: Pick up is great
Reveiw: I'm driving the Kia Seltos HTK+ Diesel model. Overall the car is best. I have driven it 6500kms, but still no issue. Pick up is great. Mileage is around 21kms also best on bad roads. The car is best on curve road to have great grip. Infotainment is good. Some issues with Android Auto gets disconnected within1hr. But with a software update, it will get resolved. Seats are very comfortable and backside you can have a big space after folding it.

Title: This car makes you feel like a king.
Reveiw: It's a pleasure to sit in the car and treats me like a king.

Title: Great car.
Reveiw: Smooth driving and luxurious car.

Title: Class and comfort.
Reveiw: Satisfying ride, comfortable seats, powerful beast. I tried other cars in the same price range but no one was comforting as this one.

Title: For specialist of car.
Reveiw: Most popular car in the world because of looks. Its look is very good and has many features that contain In-car 50-liter storage to fill tanks and many features. This car drives smoothly and this car is best for buying.

Title: Not satisfactory.
Reveiw: I just bought the one but the mileage of the car is not satisfactory. It doesn't give more than 12km/ltr.

Title: Build to thrill.
Reveiw: Fantastic tuned engine, hi-tech entertainment system, great build quality, comfortable seats and decor, first time ever air filters in the car and brilliant suspension. I have been driving Seltos HTX Diesel for 1000 km now and the car never ceases to surprise. More airbags could have helped and the rear seat could have been a bit longer for supporting the knees. Great mileage and BS 6 compliance are a bonus. For the discerning buyers, this is a competitively priced offering. Much better choice compared to MG Hector, Harrier and XUV as this is designed keeping the Indian consumer in mind. Unlike other auto manufacturers, Kia Seltos is not a copy & paste of a foreign model but a fundamentally well-designed car for Indian conditions. Thrills all the way.

Title: Incredible design and performance.
Reveiw: New in the Indian market, Kia Seltos is everything that one needs in a mid-size SUV. Value for money, indeed.

Title: New age car for new generation.
Reveiw: Good car with the futuristic and latest tech, appealing to masses especially gen x,y, and z. Looks sturdy, has road presence and a differentiator when runs on the road, a masculine look which is attracting most of the young people. Multiple variants and both manual and auto transmission options make it a top seller. The only area where it needs to work on is the mileage, which is not at its best compared to other vehicles available competing with Seltos. Mileage is 8-10 which is slightly on the lower side. Ride quality is excellent with very low engine noise. Good torque and control at high speeds and turns.

Title: Amazing car.
Reveiw: It's a good looking car, nice performance, comfort level is good and luxurious. The interior is very attractive and of good quality.

Title: The best car.
Reveiw: Very good car in budget with the best performance, low maintenance and undoubtedly controlling is also very well.

Title: GOOD CAR IN THIS PRICE TAG.
Reveiw: A very good car, in this price tag they gave all premium interiors but the only thing petrol DCT transmission heats up.

Title: Safety is important not the features.
Reveiw: These new entrants are not as per the safety norms. Only features and comprising on safety. People in India are not looking at safety ratings while purchasing a car like playing with life. This is well understood by these vehicle manufacturers and hence they are putting only features. I think safety should be first.

Title: A start of new era.
Reveiw: If we talk about the overall ratings of Seltos, no one can give a proper review. When I started the engine, the sound was so negligible that I cannot tell you the silence in the cabin. The power to thrust ratio is well explained in this Car. Even if you scale at 3rd gear. The engine seems to be smooth and amazing. I would suggest Seltos over The Hector and the Harrier.

Title: The great car.
Reveiw: The car is great at handling and suspension is set good for the Indian roads. Good design in exterior as well as interior, The engine shows good aggressiveness in the real world. Offroad experience is good too because of the suspension and the projector headlights. The space that the car offers in the second row and in the boot is pretty good. The car looks great in the outer world.

Title: The Beast.
Reveiw: Excellent SUV with modern technology, style, performance, handling, comfort. Perfect vehicle by Kia. Impressed with the long list of features including Head's up display, Air purifier, 360 camera with the blind-spot camera. Kia plays a key role in the Indian market.

Title: Best car under 10 lakh
Reveiw: Kia Seltos is providing all features in under 10 lakh price range. An awesome car as compared to other cars. Mostly, getting all the safety features in this car.

Title: Deserves a 5-star.
Reveiw: Seltos is a big hit in India. Kia released their first car and got a massive hike. The horsepower and 1-liter turbo charge is just lit. It became the fourth largest car producing companies in India already. The screen in the car is just awesome and should've got panoramic sunroof competing for the MG Hector. The speed is pretty good.

Title: A great car.
Reveiw: The best car in the segment and is quite affordable.

Title: Amazing car.
Reveiw: Great design and silent cabin with good ground clearance. Comfortable to drive for longer travel.

Title: A decent car.
Reveiw: I had a test drive and the performance and comfort were good. The riding position should have been better.

Title: Wonderful car.
Reveiw: This car is unbelievable due to its features and looks it has.

Title: Most amazing car.
Reveiw: Best experience with new Kia. Fully loaded with Hi-Tech features. Enjoying the drive as this is the most amazing car ever.

Title: Very good car.
Reveiw: A fabulous car which is very much extra-ordinary.

Title: Amazing car.
Reveiw: Really an amazing car and a very smooth car.

Title: Great car.
Reveiw: The Kia Seltos is a bit more expensive but offers a lot more for it in terms of safety and features. It is well worth the premium over the MG Hector
